Package logging

Interface SharedBuffer

All Known Subinterfaces:
LogProducer
All Known Implementing Classes:
CacheManager, FileMonitor, FileService, HeaderBuilder, Logger, MainHTTPServerThread, RequestHandler, RequestValidator, ServerConfig, ThreadPool, WorkerThread
public interface SharedBuffer
Shared interface containing a global blocking queue for logging tasks.

This buffer is used by both log producers and the Logger thread to asynchronously pass log entries. All classes implementing this interface share the same static buffer instance.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final BlockingQueue<LoggingTask>
    buffer
    The global blocking queue used for logging task handoff.

  • Field Details

    • buffer

      static final BlockingQueue<LoggingTask> buffer
      The global blocking queue used for logging task handoff. Implementations of LogProducer add to this queue, while the Logger thread polls and processes entries from it.
